text: Pablo Valcarce Vidal (born 3 February 1993) is a Spanish footballer who plays for SD Ponferradina, on loan from RCD Mallorca. Mainly a right winger, he can also play as a forward. ==Club career== ===Numancia=== Born in Ponferrada, Castile and León,Pablo y Luis Valcarce, los gemelos de Ponferrada (Pablo and Luis Valcarce, the Ponferrada twins); Diario de León, 4 March 2013 (in Spanish) Valcarce began his career with hometown club SD Ponferradina, making his senior debut with the reserves. In 2011 he moved to CD Numancia, being initially assigned to the youth setup and being promoted to the B-team after one year. On 30 January 2015, both Valcarce and his twin brother Luis renewed their contract with the Rojillos, until 2017.Los hermanos Valcarce renuevan su contrato con el Numancia (The Valcarce brothers renew their contract with Numancia) ; CD Numancia, 30 January 2015 (in Spanish) He played his first match as a professional on 15 March, coming on as a late substitute for Javier del Pino in a 0–4 away loss against Real Valladolid for the Segunda División championship.Monólogo del Valladolid ante un Numancia con diez (Valladolid monologue against ten-man Numancia); Marca, 15 March 2015 (in Spanish) Valcarce scored his first league goal on 23 August, netting his team's fifth in a 6–3 home victory over CD Tenerife.Set del Numancia al Tenerife con lluvia de goles en la segunda parte (Numancia set to Tenerife with goals pouring in in the second half); Marca, 23 August 2015 (in Spanish) Six days later, he netted a double in a 3–2 win at Girona FC, the second being a last-minute effort.Victoria sobre la hora y liderato (Buzzer victory and first place); Marca, 29 August 2015 (in Spanish) On 29 January 2016, Valcarce signed his first professional contract, being definitely promoted to the main squad and assigned the 20 jersey.El Numancia hace profesional a Pablo Valcarce (Numancia turn Pablo Valcarce professional); CD Numancia, 29 January 2016 (in Spanish) He scored two braces during the 2016–17 campaign, against Elche CF (2–2, at home)El Numancia desperdicia su renta y permite empatar al Elche (Numancia waste advantage and allow Elche to draw); Marca, 6 November 2016 (in Spanish) and UCAM Murcia CF (2–3 away loss), both in November.Agónica remontada del UCAM ante un Numancia con nueve (Agonizing UCAM comeback against nine-man Numancia); Marca, 26 November 2016 (in Spanish) ===Mallorca=== On 2 July 2018, free agent Valcarce signed a four-year contract with fellow second division side RCD Mallorca.El RCD Mallorca ficha a Pablo Valcarce hasta 2022 (RCD Mallorca sign Pablo Valcarce until 2022); RCD Mallorca, 2 July 2018 (in Spanish) He made his official debut on 19 August, playing 20 minutes in place of Aridai Cabrera in a 1–0 home defeat CA Osasuna. Valcarce scored his first goal on 1 December 2018, in 2–0 away win against CF Reus Deportiu. He made only ten appearances during the season (12 across all competitions), as the club achieved a second consecutive promotion to reach La Liga. On 19 July 2019, Valcarce returned to Ponferradina after agreeing to a one-year loan deal.
